localize.description: 针对不同行业(电子商务、SaaS、旅游、内容、金融、时尚等)专门设计的各种复制模板(欢迎、免费试用、时事通讯、反馈、账户升级、周年纪念、公告、同意、优惠等)

previous.excerpt: Translate words straight from your Alfred launcher: - Open Alfred - Type a language combination and a word: `fren fromage` - Press enter to open the results page on WordReference! Get access to 48 dictionaries across 18 different languages!
previous.title: WordReference for Alfred - Multilingual translations at your fingertips!

localize.description: 直接从您的Alfred启动器翻译单词： - 打开Alfred - 输入语言组合和单词：`fren fromage` - 按回车键打开WordReference上的结果页面! 获得跨越18种不同语言的48种词典的访问权限!
直接從您的Alfred啓動器翻譯單詞： - 打開Alfred - 輸入語言組合和單詞：`fren fromage` - 按回車鍵打開WordReference上的結果頁面! 獲得跨越18種不同語言的48種詞典的訪問權限!

next.excerpt: ⚡ The Hashnode Blog Cards is a set of GET requests which will fetch the Blogs from your Hashnode ids with few parameters and will create SVG cards to bring 😎 awesomeness to your blog links. 🎉 Github link https://github.com/Souravdey777/HashnodeBlogCards
next.title: Hashnode Blog Cards - Replace your Hashnode Blog links with Blogs Cards.

localize.description: ⚡ Hashnode博客卡是一组GET请求，它将通过少量参数从你的Hashnode ids中获取博客，并将创建SVG卡，为你的博客链接带来😎惊艳。🎉 Github 链接 https://github.com/Souravdey777/HashnodeBlogCards
localize.tagline: 将您的Hashnode博客链接替换为博客卡。

localize.description: ⚡ Hashnode博客卡是一組GET請求，它將通過少量參數從你的Hashnode ids中獲取博客，並將創建SVG卡，爲你的博客鏈接帶來😎驚豔。🎉 Github 鏈接 https://github.com/Souravdey777/HashnodeBlogCards
localize.tagline: 將您的Hashnode博客鏈接替換爲博客卡。
